com.ece.superkids.users

Class FileParentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ece.superkids.users.FileParentManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParentManager

    public class FileParentManager
extends Object
implements ParentManager
    The FileParentManager stores the parent account information on the local file system in the user home directory. The parent password is heavily salted and then hashed before being stored anywhere on the file system. This will prevent cracking of the password.
    Author:
    Ben Duong
